description: Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs; Shomron, Dan -- Photographs
label: The IDF Golani Unit celebrated the end of the summer exercises at the Sultan Pool, Jerusalem with the presence of Defence Minister Itzhak Rabin, Chief of Staff Rav Aluf Dan Shomron and many guests.
